snippet: Among other differences, the temperature for class is set at just below 100 degrees rather than Bikram’s 105.
abstract: Canadians Ted Grand and Jessica Robertson have founded their Moksha Yoga brand of hot yoga studios in response to dissatisfaction with certain aspects of Bikram yoga; brand, known as Modo Yoga in United States, has become favorite of models, performers and fashion types, particularly in its West Village location.
lead_paragraph: Among other differences, the temperature for class is set at just below 100 degrees rather than Bikram’s 105.

headline.main: Modo, a New Version of Bikram Hot Yoga, Is Growing Popular
headline.print_headline: Taking the Temperature of Hot Yoga
